name: 田方治
objective:
本課程之目的在訓練大學部學生於撰寫程式之能力，程式語言 (一、二) 以 Python 為實踐主體，課程內容包含：複習 Operators and Expression、流程控制 (while, for, if-elif-else)、函式 (function)、module、data structure；並學習 input/output、OOP (Class 概念)、及 exception；並將介紹廣泛使用之標準程式庫，包括: sys、datetime、os、random、argparse、numpy、pandas、matplotlib、pillow、pyqt、scipy， scikit-learn、opencv-python、request、Selenium、beautifulsoup4 等；並將配合學期之 project，訓練同學團隊合作及系統開法之經驗。
The objective of this course is to cultivate the programming ability for undergraduates. Python is the language used in this course since its simplicity and widely applicable. The content of this course includes: reviewing operators and expression, flow control, functions, module, data structure, and extensively learning input/output, class (OOP), and exception. Besides, this course will introduce the commonly used packages, such as os, numpy, sys, pandas, matplotlib, pillow, pyqt, etc.  There will be a term project to let student experience team-working and system design and management.
schedule:
Week 1: Introduction to Python and python installation
Week 2: Operators and Expression
Week 3: 流程控制 I (Logic control)
Week 4: 流程控制 II (Logic control)
Week 5: 函式 (Function)
Week 6: module and function
Week 7: datta structure: tuple、list、dictionary
Week 8: input/output (file)
Week 9: Test #1
Week 10: Class I
Week 11: Class II
Week 12: Problem-Based Learning: Topic I – Database, openxl
Week 13: Problem-Based Learning: Topic II – Image Processing
Week 14: Problem-Based Learning: Topic III – Webserver
Week 15: Problem-Based Learning: Topic IV – GUI (PyQt)
Week 16: Problem-Based Learning: Topic IV – GUI (Statistics)
Week 17: Final
Week 18: Project Demo

name: 陳協慶
objective:
介紹 AI 相關的應用以及 Python 及 VBA 語言資料處理的應用，課程內容介紹類神經網路、深度學習、ChatGPT 之應用與基礎原理，Python 及 VBA 程式開發環境、流程圖、程式之編輯除錯、基本輸出 / 入、條件判斷、迴圈等程式結構，訓練學生撰寫函數與副程式之基本能力。
This course introduces AI-related and data-processing applications in Python and VBA languages. The course content introduces the application and basic principles of neural networks, deep learning, ChatGPT, Python/ VBA programming environments, flowcharts, code editing and debugging, and program structures such as fundamental input/output, sequence, condition, and loop to train students' essential ability of coding functions and subroutines.
schedule:
#1   Excel 及 VBA 開發環境簡介
#2   程式流程圖，巨集程式錄製與修改 
#3   物件、範圍參照與屬性 
#4   Sub 流程控制 ­- 邏輯判斷語法 (If, Select)
#5   Quiz-1
#6   流程控制 (For, Do 迴圈)
#7   變數宣告與轉換，流程控制 (For, Do 迴圈)
#8   變數、資料型態與字串處理 
#9   期中考
#10  ChatGPT 工具使用介紹
#11 Python 程式環境介紹
#12 cmd and print, VS code
#13 Basic variable and expression & Data types
#14 Logic control 1
#15 Quiz-2
#16 Logic control 2, 3
#17 Local vs. global variables
#18 Final Exam
